item.title: Convert words in a String into camelCase in Java using Apache Commons Text
item.description: Introduction In this article we are going to explore Apache Commons Text library by using CaseUtils utility class to convert a String of separated words into a camelCase String. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Setup Apache Commons Text in Java project If you are using Gradle build then add the following dependency configuration into build.gradle file. compile group: 'org.apache.commons', name: 'commons-text', version: '1.9' Or add the following dependency XML tag to pom.
